name: Ganning Xu
title: Project Manager
desc: Hi there! I’m a current high school junior at the North Carolina School of Science and Mathematics. I cofounded Verste because of my experience reading research papers. Many of the words were so difficult that it was hard for me to even understand a general summary of the paper. Verste is here to change that! Fun Fact: I love eating food.

name: Roxanne Egamino
title: Logistics & Outreach
desc: Hello, I’m Roxanne Egamino! I’m currently a junior at Apex Friendship. I like traveling and listening to music! Fun fact: I visited every state along the east coast except for Maine.

name: Ivan Zheng
title: Marketing Lead
desc: Hello, my name is Ivan Zheng. I am a junior at the North Carolina School of Science and Mathematics. I like coding, and using photoshop! Math is also cool but I'm bad at it. I hope you enjoy using Verste!

name: Jacob Van Meter
title: Developer
desc: Hey, I’m Jacob Van Meter, a junior at NCSSM who likes coding and helping out with Verste. I mainly work on research around modeling, control, and state estimation!

name: Jessica Fan
title: Marketing
desc: Hi, my name is Jessica Fan. I am currently a high school junior at NCSSM. I like physics, biology, chemistry, and math.

name: Maheen Rassell
title: Creative Design Intern
desc: A young mind with a thirst for knowledge. Basketball and video game enthusiast. I love connecting with people from all around the world and learning about different perspectives. My mission is to make research accessible to everyone!

name: Crystal Ojiako
title: Creative Design Intern
desc: Hello, my name is Crystal Ojiako, and I am a current Jordan High School junior. In my spare time, I enjoy reading, listening to music, and taking photographs, as well as conducting research, primarily on addressing ethical disparities in healthcare.

name: Khushi Kolte
title: Creative Design Intern
desc: My name is Khushi Kolte, and I am a rising sophomore in high school. I love to dance, make art, and code. I am passionate, creative, and kind. I enjoy graphic designing, and learning about how to incorporate creative design into our world.

name: Lakshmi Bhavana Kalyani Pachipulusu
title: Creative Design Intern
desc: I love to code, read books, write stories, and learn new things. Next year, I'll be a junior at Tesla STEM High School.
